item.title: The glorious rise and fall of the CCPC
item.description: About a year ago a few of my friends on Discord introduced me to the wild cursed world of Chinese domestic electronics. Me being an absolute fiend for unfathomably cursed electronics (the worse the better), I couldn’t resist the urge to get in on the action. After a few hours of trying to figure out how to create an account on Xianyu (basically Chinese eBay), I started my hunt for that sweet Chinesium gold.

item.title: Welcome to the melontek blog!!
item.description:
This is a very very very basic first post on the brand spanking new melontek blog. To be honest I’m not really sure what I’ll be posting on here yet. Probably gonna be a mix of some ewaste fuckery writeups and maybe some documentation for some projects.

If I ever lock in and actually make videos, I might use this for some additional documentation or resources related to my videos. In the meantime, watch this FX 5800 video pleaseeee, i worked really hard on it!!!!
